description:
Arma arrojadiza que explota causando un daño de 300 HP
al grupo enemigo.
name: Granada
note:
<setup action>
display action
inmortal: targets,true
perform start
wait for movement
</setup action>

<whole action>
motion spell: user, no weapon
se: Fall
wait: 30
action animation
wait for animation
action effect
motion wait: user
death break
</whole action>

perform start
wait for movement
